crumbs.text: The single window for technologies presentation

lead.title: The single window for technologies presentation

text: We propose to use a new functional service — The single window for technologies presentation. It includes the opportunity for potential suppliers to present their products and / or technical solutions to a wide range of technical specialists of the Inter RAO Group companies without sending official requests, incl. by sending a presentation or hosting a webinar.

items.text: Fill out the application form on the service page
Choose a convenient way of presenting your products to a wide range of technical specialists of the Inter RAO Group companies
